subs.title: Indonesian alphabet (26 letters, Latin system)
subs.content: The Indonesian alphabet uses 26 letters from A-Z, based on the Latin system.

subs.title: Vowel sounds
subs.content: Five vowels (a, e, i, o, u) with consistent pronunciation.

subs.title: Formal greetings (Selamat pagi, siang, sore, malam)
